name: Cursed House Match 3 Puzzle
description:
That's the first match 3 game in the Cursed House series! The goal was to make the game innovative and make new mechanics you've never seen before including the challenge against the AI opponent. So, there are 10 game mechanics you won't see in other Match 3 games.
The game has both Relaxed and Timed modes.

Banish the evil spirits from the house that is cursed and possessed by ancient evil creatures! Save the Cursed House using your Match 3 skills, and ward off the ghosts! Gather magic power for an ancient amulet, and use its power to restore the house to its former beauty. Match up the different objects and save the day in Cursed House!
